overview: Paris By Night 105: Người Tình (The Lovers) is a Paris By Night program produced by Thuy Nga that was filmed for the very first time at Foxwoods Resort & Casino in Mashantucket, Connecticut which was hosted by Nguyễn Ngọc Ngạn and Nguyễn Cao Kỳ Duyên. The taping took place on March 17 & 18, 2012 and was released on DVD & Blu-ray on June 15, 2012.
title: Thuy Nga Paris By Night 105
